footer.aboutDescription: We provide insights into high-traffic websites, helping you find profitable opportunities online with EarnMapify.

home.heroTitle: EarnMapify - Discover Top High-Traffic Websites for Profit
home.heroDescription: Discover top high-traffic websites on EarnMapify. Explore paid sites, platform subs, industry leaders, and income trends to find profitable opportunities now!
home.paidSitesDescription: Discover high-traffic websites on paid platforms like PayPal and Stripe to maximize your revenue
home.platformDescription: Explore high-traffic subdomains on GitHub and Vercel to boost your project’s growth and engagement.
home.industryDescription: Find the top 1000 websites in gaming, tools, and more, driving trends and innovation.

paidSites.heroDescription: Discover high-traffic websites in payment platforms like PayPal and Stripe

revenueCalculator.trafficDescription: The number of monthly visitors from the target website to the payment platform (such as Stripe/PayPal).(K: thousands, M: millions)
revenueCalculator.orderValueDescription: The typical price of the product/service on the pricing page of the target website (you can check the pricelist on the target website)
revenueCalculator.revenueDescription: This calculator can help estimate the potential monthly revenue of subscription/payment websites:
revenueCalculator.revenueNote: The actual revenue may have some errors, such as unsuccessful payment or visitor cancellation; this data is for reference only, if you have any questions, please feel free to leave a message to communicate.
revenueCalculator.revenueFormula: Formula: Monthly Payment Page Visitors × Average Order Value

platformSubs.heroDescription: Discover high-traffic subdomains across popular hosting platforms

platformTable.googleSERP: Go to Google SERP for the keyword

industryLeaders.heroDescription: Discover top performing websites in games and tools categories

adCalculator.title: Monthly Ad Revenue Calculator
adCalculator.adPerPage: Ads per Page(AD units displayed per page)
adCalculator.reference: Here are some rough reference ranges, US: $5 - $10 ; Canada: $4 - $8; UK: $4 - $8; Australia: $4 - $8; Germany: $3 - $7; France: $3 - $6; Japan: $2 - $5; India: $0.5 - $2; Brazil: $0.5 - $2; China: $0.5 - $2.
adCalculator.adNote: Actual CPM based on your website content, audience, and ad types. For accurate data, use Google AdSense reporting tools.
adCalculator.formula2: Monthly Visits  × Pages per Visit× Ads per Page × CPM ÷ 1000

incomeTrends.heroDescription: Explore 2025 income trends with top AI tools revenue from Toolify, Product Hunt leaderboard insights, and trending Hugging Face models.
incomeTrends.toolify: Toolify: Best AI Tools Revenue Insights
incomeTrends.toolifyDescription: AI High Revenue Ranking based on AI website rankings on payment platforms and actual monthly traffic to the website.
incomeTrends.productHunt: Product Hunt: Monthly & Weekly Leaderboard Trends
incomeTrends.productHuntDescription: Product Hunt is a curation of the best new products, every day. Discover the latest mobile apps, websites, and technology products that everyone's talking about.
incomeTrends.indieHackers: Indie Hackers - Products that make money
incomeTrends.indieHackersDescription: Discover hundreds of businesses, startups, and side projects that are making money online, and learn how they got to where they are today.
incomeTrends.huggingFace: Hugging Face: Most Downloaded & Liked Models
incomeTrends.huggingFaceDescription: We're on a journey to advance and democratize artificial intelligence through open source and open science.
incomeTrends.googleTrendsDescription: Explore the latest trending searches with real-time insights. This page showcases what people are currently searching for, from breaking news to popular topics, updated dynamically.

about.p1: Welcome to EarnMapify, your comprehensive guide to understanding and tracking the most successful online businesses and income opportunities. Our platform provides detailed insights into various monetization strategies and success patterns across different industries.

dataSources.title: Data Sources
dataSources.description: The data presented on this website is gathered from multiple sources:

sources.similarweb: Similarweb for traffic and analytics data
sources.public: Public from platforms like GitHub, Product Hunt, and more
